text: If set to _______, the JSON output will contain newlines and whitespace.
If set to an _______, the JSON output will contain that many spaces per indentation.
The _______ is the glue between the template and controller.
What function manually starts up angular application?
What function determines if a reference is an Array?
The ________ directive allows you to specify custom behavior when an element is clicked.
What directive attaches a controller class to the view?
The _______ service is a core Angular service that facilitates communication with the remote HTTP servers via the browser's XMLHttpRequest object or via JSONP.
The ________ service is responsible for instantiating controllers.
The main purpose of the ________ service is to simplify debugging and troubleshooting.
The $http service is a function which takes a single argument — a configuration object — that is used to generate an HTTP request and returns a _______
What servive is a Factory that constructs Cache objects and gives access to them?
What directive creates new scope?
The $controller is dependant of the ________.
The ________ directive instantiates a template once per item from a collection.
ngRepeat uses ________ to detect changes in the collection. When a change happens, ngRepeat then makes the corresponding changes to the ________.
To minimize creation of DOM elements, ngRepeat uses a function to _________ of all items in the collection and their corresponding DOM elements.
If you do need to repeat duplicate items, you can substitute the default tracking behavior with your own using the ________ expression.
You can specify an ________ to be used as the root module for the application.
The $controller service returns an _______ of a given controller.
